alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central La Salle County through 1230 AM CDT... At 1159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Cotulla, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Artesia Wells. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 53 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south Texas.
